snippet: Mohammed Hussein has stacked 300 sandbags outside his coffee shop in Beirut's southern suburbs to reassure customers frightened by a wave of deadly bombings there, but business is still down by half....

headline.print_headline: Beirut Suburb on High Alert After Wave of Bombings
headline.main: Beirut Suburb on High Alert After Wave of Bombings

lead_paragraph: Mohammed Hussein has stacked 300 sandbags outside his coffee shop in Beirut's southern suburbs to reassure customers frightened by a wave of deadly bombings there, but business is still down by half.
